name: MegaMacho Oco
storyline:
On the day of the highly anticipated release of 'Pai de Família 4', something terrible happened...
The dreaded forbidden meme Dr. Demalixo has invaded Ícarus Studios and stolen the only reel of the world's most delicious movie!
Now with the deliciousness at risk, it's up to our cyber hero MegaMacho to get the film back and secure the deliciousness for the planet!
summary: MegaMacho Oco is a parody platformer based on the Megaman franchise and the gay pornographic movie 'Ursos Grandes, Peludos e Mansos', it also features various Brazilian memes as enemies.
